Title: Prohibits the use of coupons or use of a price reduction instrument to lower the price of certain tobacco products
Summary: Prohibits the use of coupons or use of a price reduction instrument to lower the price of certain tobacco products.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-bb-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the use of coupons or use of a "price reduction instrument" to lower the price of certain tobacco products
